Gini Capture Accounting Network Library for Android

Implementation using the Gini Accounting API of the network related tasks required by the Gini Capture SDK.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
net.gini.android.capture.accounting.network
Implementations of the GiniCaptureNetworkService and the GiniCaptureNetworkApi using the Gini Accounting API.
net.gini.android.capture.accounting.network.model
Contains mappers for converting Gini Capture SDK model classes used for extractions to their Gini Pay API lib counterparts and vice versa.
net.gini.android.capture.network  
net.gini.android.capture.network.model  

Implementation using the Gini Accounting API of the network related tasks required by the Gini Capture SDK.

Adding this library along with the Gini Capture SDK to your application is the quickest way to integrate document scanning with Gini's Accounting API.

In order for the Gini Capture SDK to use this networking library pass the instances to the GiniCapture.Builder when creating a new GiniCapture.

Important:You must not enable multi-page in the Gini Capture SDK when using it with this networking library. The multi-page feature is currently only supported by the default networking library.

Requirements

Android 4.4+ (API Level 19+)

Version:
2.x
Author:
Gini GmbH
